product_name: Merrell Lidia Roll-Up Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Roll out adventure in the performance-oriented Merrell Lidia Roll-Up Shorts. Made with lightweight, quick-drying heathered fabric, they're honed to meet the demands of trail and travel in style. Lightweight heathered fabric drapes nicely, wicks moisture away from your skin and dries quickly, so you stay comfortable. Offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Button tabs let you roll up the legs or keep them longer. Gusseted crotch eliminates chafing for walking comfort. Drawcord waist lets you fine-tune the fit. Merrell Lidia Roll-Up Shorts provide 2 slash hand pockets with button tabs, and 2 back pockets with button tabs. Closeout.
short_description: Roll out adventure in the performance-oriented Merrell Lidia Roll-Up Shorts. Made with lightweight, quick-drying heathered fabric, they're honed to meet the demands of trail and travel in style.
